name: Aisha Ali
clarity_response: A living taste profile app — rate experiences one tap, builds your ranked record, and discovers better plans through friend network ratings. Works solo from day one. Like Beli for everything.

what_feels_off: Honestly, almost nothing. This is the most complete version. Only remaining wish: a screenshot of the interface.
objections: Need to see the interface. But I'd download free to evaluate. Page has done its job.
gut_reaction: This is the version. The specific examples are back — '8/10 Thai place, 4/10 tourist trap' — and they make the whole concept tangible again. Combined with the tighter page and the taste analytics detail, this is a complete pitch.
unanswered_questions: Need to see the interface. But I'd download free to evaluate. Page has done its job.
price_reaction: $99/year is my choice. The taste analytics alone justify it. Fair price for a daily-use tool.
